sentences.en: Alex stands at the crossroads at present.
sentences.cn: 爱历克斯现在正面临抉择.

sentences.en: Four men led by a sergeant lay in ambush at the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 由一名中士率领的四名士兵埋伏在十字路口.

sentences.en: He came to a halt at a crossroads fifty yards further on.
sentences.cn: 他在往前50码远的十字路口停了下来。

sentences.en: He's at a crossroads in his career — either he stays in his current job and waits for promotion, or he accepts this new post in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 他的事业正处在紧要关头,要么继续干目前的工作,等着升职, 要么就接受巴西的新工作.

sentences.en: He's been gone long enough to get clear to the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 他已去了那么久,可以一直走到十字路口.

sentences.en: I'll stop for you at the crossroads.
Our army stole a march on the enemy and reached the crossroads an hour ahead of them.
sentences.cn: 我军偷偷地抢在敌军前面行动,比他们早一小时到达十字路口.

sentences.en: She turned back towards the crossroads.
Slow up / down before you reach the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 到达十字路口前你要减速.

sentences.en: Take a right turn at the crossroads.
Take the left side road [ fork ] at the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 到十字路口走左边的岔道.

sentences.en: The car was approaching the crossroads.
The officer reined in his horse at a crossroads.
sentences.cn: 军官在十字路口勒住了马.

sentences.en: The traffic policeman took his stand at the crossroads.
sentences.cn: 交通警察在十字路口站岗.

sentences.en: They had reached a crossroads in their relationship.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系发展到了关键阶段。

sentences.en: Turn left at the crossroads into Clay Lane.
sentences.cn: 十字路口左转进克雷巷。

words.tran_cn: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点（crossroad的复数形式）

trans.tran_cn: 十字路口，转折点，重大的抉择时刻
trans.tran_en: a place where two roads meet and cross each other
